text:
Nedeljko Čubrilović (born 5 April 1953) is a Bosnian Serb politician. He is the 7th and current Speaker of the National Assembly of Republika Srpska.
In 2000, he joined the Democratic People's Alliance (DNS). Shortly after, he was elected as the 1st president of the newly established DEMOS on 22 December 2018 in Banja Luka.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the National Assembly of Republika Srpska
